t: This psalm is an acrostic poem, the stanzas of which begin with the successive letters of the Hebrew alphabet.
37:26*r Or freely;*i /*i the*i names*i of*i their*i children*i will*i be*i used*i in*i blessings*i (see Gen. 48:20); or freely;*i /*i others*i will*i see*i that*i their*i children*i are*i blessed*i
37:28*r See Septuagint; Hebrew They*i will*i be*i protected*i forever*i
37:37*r Or upright;*i /*i those*i who*i seek*i peace*i will*i have*i posterity*i
